pointings – define pointing networks for telescope¶

pointing¶

pointings

pointings (inherient from tilings and galaxies): define the name and a pointing list for one telescope.

Tilings¶

tilings([logger])

tilings: Generate, read and process tilings

tilings.generatep(self[, limra, limdec, …])

generate pointings by tiling sky

tilings.generatep_trigger(self, hpmap[, …])

generate pointings depends on trigger localizations.

tilings.readp_coo(self[, ra, dec, fovra, …])

read pointings from coordinate lists

tilings.readp_file(self, filename[, …])

read pointings from file

tilings.removep_coo(self, ra, dec, fovra, fovdec)

remove fields by input coordinate

tilings.removep_file(self[, split, nest, …])

remove fields by input file

tilings.savep(self, filename[, filetype, …])

save tilings to a file

tilings.reportp(self[, split])

make a report for self.data

tilings.groupp(self, obra, obdec)

group sub-tilings to a joint tiling

tilings.dividep(self, obra, obdec)

divide each tiling to a serious of sub-tilings

tilings.rankp(self[, mode, nside, nest, …])

rank pointings: rank from west to east

Galaxies¶

galaxies([logger])

galaxies: generate (by querying astropy.Vizier), read and process galaxies

galaxies.generatep(self[, catalog, filter, …])

generate galaxies by querying Vizier

galaxies.generatep_trigger(self, hpmap[, …])

generate pointings depends on trigger localizations.

galaxies.readp_file(self, filename[, …])

read pointings from a file

galaxies.removep_coo(self, ra, dec, fovra, …)

remove fields by input coordinate

galaxies.removep_file(self[, split, nest, …])

remove fields by input file

galaxies.savep(self, filename[, filetype, …])

save tilings to a file

galaxies.groupp(self, obra, obdec)

group sub-galaxies, assign them with same index

galaxies.reportp(self[, split])

make a report for self.data

galaxies.rankp(self[, mode, nside, nest, …])

rank pointings: rank from west to east

galaxies.gmap(self[, tracer, nside, nest])

build a healpix map with KBGetGalaxies.data

sn_data_analysis: sdapy
